original_text: Necho's soldiers hit King Josiah with their arrows. The king said to his servants, ‘Take me away from the battle! The arrows have hurt me very much.’
korean_text: 활 쏘는 자가 요시야 왕을 쏜지라 왕이 그의 신하들에게 이르되 내가 중상을 입었으니 나를 도와 나가게 하라

sentences.original_text: The king said to his servants
Take me away from the battle
The arrows have hurt me very much
sentences.korean_translation: 화살들이 나를 아주 많이 다치게 했다
